name: Space Fall
description:
Space Fall is a game made in 3 hours for the 47th Tri Jam. The theme was One step to death.  Just like the theme specifies you are always one step away from death in Space Fall.

The music for this game was created by emceeciscokid

https://freesound.org/people/emceeciscokid/sounds/434856/

Controls:

W / Up Arrow - Move Up

A / Left Arrow - Move Left

S / Down Arrow - Move Down

D / Right Arrow - Move Right

The source code for this project is available here: https://github.com/CedarBishop/SpaceFall 

Enjoy :)
